item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd September
item.description:
We were made aware that the roots from the tree on the highway (highlighted in the photo below) are starting to lift both the driveway and the steps leading to main entrance. We are also concerned that beneath the steps is the mains meter cupboard for the building. Could you let me know if there is anything that can be done to the tree in order prevent further damage to the driveway/steps please?
Report on FixMyStreet
